# **Plots with R for dataset mtcars**  
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

#Scatterplot for Mileage vs Weight
ggplot(data,aes(x=hp,y=mpg))+geom_point(col="darkgreen",pch=19, size=2)+ggtitle("Scatterplot: Mileage vs Power",subtitle = "Motor Trend Car Road Tests (1974)")+xlab("Power(in hp)")+ylab("Miles per gallon(mpg)")


```
